function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited dataset for Covid-19 impact on mutual funds","Impact":"Potential misrepresentation of the actual impact of Covid-19 on mutual funds","Mitigation":"Expand the dataset to include a larger and more diverse sample of mutual funds","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools for financial data","People":"Investors, fund managers, and financial analysts","Owner":"Research institutions and financial organizations"},{"Description":"Dynamic and evolving situation of Covid-19","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the current impact of Covid-19 on asset management in the EU","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and analysis of Covid-19 impact on asset management","Technologies":"Real-time data tracking and analysis tools","People":"Policy makers, financial regulators, and asset managers","Owner":"Government agencies and financial institutions"},{"Description":"Risk of misrepresentation in financial research","Impact":"Inaccurate or biased findings in financial research","Mitigation":"Ensure transparency, peer review, and adherence to research standards","Technologies":"Data validation and research integrity tools","People":"Academics, researchers, and financial analysts","Owner":"Academic institutions and professional organizations"}]}
